description: Continuation of STAT 101. A thorough treatment of multiple regression, model selection, analysis of variance, linear logistic regression; introduction to time series. Business applications.
name: INTRO BUSINESS STAT

values.comments:
This course offers a thorough treatment of multiple regression, model selection, analysis of variance, linear
logistic regression, and time series, with a focus on business applications.

Students reported the course was informative and helpful. Many enjoyed the class and felt they had learned a lot. However, students felt that there was a disconnection between material taught in lecture, homework, and exams.

Many students thought Professor Shaman was a great professor, who was "knowledgeable" and "helpful." Some felt his lectures were a little "dry."

Most students found the workload "reasonable" and said it did not require a lot of time. Students also felt that concepts were "not very difficult."
